titleStmt.title: The holy choice, or, Faith's triumph over all worldly pomp & glory a sermon preached in St. Maries in Scilly, Oct. 14, 1677 / by Nich. Phillips, twice chaplain to His Majesties garrison there ; and tendred at the council-table, Jan. 23, 1679.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, Nicholas.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, torn, and tightly bound with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
